医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现击败看不见的癌细胞的新方法现代免疫疗法增强了人体自身对癌症的防御能力。它们激活免疫系统的杀伤性 T 细胞，可以特异性识别并摧毁癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Scientists-discover-new-way-to-defeat-invisible-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Scientists-discover-new-way-to-defeat-invisible-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b19bf5ff-edc3-423c-ab95-98e7dea9213a Fri, 23 Jun 2023 12:15:50 -0400 Scientists discover new way to defeat invisible cancer cells
研究揭示类固醇如何影响癌症免疫疗法免疫疗法是最新、最有效的抗癌武器之一。它促使免疫系统将肿瘤识别为体内的入侵者并进行攻击。但并非所有患者都对免疫疗法反应良好。为什么？科学家并不总是确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Research-sheds-light-on-how-steroids-affect-cancer-Immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Research-sheds-light-on-how-steroids-affect-cancer-Immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f9227b0-16d6-4dc6-940e-046492449ae0 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 12:13:37 -0400 Research sheds light on how steroids affect cancer Immunotherapy
波士顿大学研究人员获得 280 万美元资助，用于研究血清素在慢性压力和抑郁症中的作用波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院解剖学和神经生物学助理教授 Michael Wallace 博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院、国家心理健康研究所颁发的 280 万美元资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/BU-researcher-receives-2428M-grant-to-study-serotonins-role-in-chronic-stress-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/BU-researcher-receives-2428M-grant-to-study-serotonins-role-in-chronic-stress-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fb6a4cb-96b8-4e8d-bb95-be52e3e01fe0 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 12:11:14 -0400 BU researcher receives $2.8M grant to study serotonin's role in chronic stress and depression
新研究为患有腋窝网综合症的女性带来了希望腋网综合征，又称淋巴血栓，是许多女性战胜乳腺癌后出现的临床表现中的并发症，主要影响她们的肩部活动能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-study-offers-hope-for-women-suffering-from-axillary-web-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-study-offers-hope-for-women-suffering-from-axillary-web-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cff6a0e-b141-4f9d-9286-9b5bee268365 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 09:58:52 -0400 New study offers hope for women suffering from axillary web syndrome
新项目旨在提高 CAR T 疗法治疗实体瘤的疗效和安全性国际财团 CAR T-REX 的合作伙伴宣布，在对其题为“CAR T 细胞重新连接以防止肿瘤微环境中的耗竭”的项目进行积极评价后，他们将获得极具竞争力的 EIC 探路者开放资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-project-aims-to-improve-the-efficacy-and-safety-of-CAR-T-therapies-for-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/New-project-aims-to-improve-the-efficacy-and-safety-of-CAR-T-therapies-for-solid-tumors.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd63314a-1ede-409e-902a-eed40f53419d Fri, 23 Jun 2023 09:40:55 -0400 New project aims to improve the efficacy and safety of CAR T therapies for solid tumors
